name: The Impossible (itch) (7Mar)
description:
Can You Beat The Impossible ?

a small game made for the "Bullet Hell Jam 2021" i didn't work on the game that much because i had exams but i think it turned out pretty good and HARD

My best time is  00:50:68 see if can beat me :)

Note:

White bar is the player health and Red bar is the Boss heath

Controls

  • Move : WASD | the Arrow Keys 
  • Shoot : X | Space | Left Mouse Button

Credit:

  • The Epic music is made by Of Far Different Nature
  • I used some sound effects form the Wowie Resource Pack
